passages.name: bourbonc10
passages.text: You spill some bourbon on the rock floor. <>\ [[Back|RoomC10]]

passages.name: c10listen
passages.text: Loud metallic thudding is coming from the south. A quiet buzz is coming from the west. [[Back|RoomC10]]

passages.name: nichec10
passages.text: You reach into the hole drilled in the rock. It is about one meter deep. SANDRA: Seems like the robots started working on a new tunnel here, but left it unfinished for some reason. [[Back|RoomC10]]

passages.name: bourbonc11
passages.text: You spill some bourbon on the rock floor. <>\ [[Back|RoomC11]]

passages.name: c11listen
passages.text: Quiet metallic thudding is coming from the south-east. A quiet buzz is coming from the south-east. [[Back|RoomC11]]

passages.name: rubblec11
passages.text: It's a huge pile of rubble. It's made of porous rocks, mixed with some metal fragments. SANDRA: It seems there used to be a tunnel here, leading to the room with the gas tank. It collapsed when the tank exploded. [[Back|RoomC11]]

passages.name: RoomC13
passages.text:
In the technical tunnels
\ After wandering the tunnels for some time you reach a chamber carved in rock. There is only one exit here, leading south-east. There is a massive door in the western wall. <> A smell of bourbon is coming from the south-eastern tunnel. <>\ <>\ <>\ <> [[Spill some bourbon|bourbonc13]] <>\ <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <> [[Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away|bourbonreset]] <>\ <>\ [[Listen|c13listen]] [[Examine the door|checkdoorc13]] [[Go south-east|RoomC11]]

links.text: Wait until the smell of bourbon fades away

passages.name: bourbonc12
passages.text: You spill some bourbon on the rock floor. <>\ [[Back|RoomC12]]

passages.name: c12listen
passages.text: A loud, buzzing noise is coming through the eastern door, drowning out all other sounds. [[Back|RoomC12]]

passages.name: RoomC15
passages.text:
Lift room
\ You are in a large room. Its walls and floor are panelled. On the western side of the room you discover a rounded lift shaft, protruding from the wall. There are doors in the northern and in the southern wall of the room. [[Examine the lift|liftc15]] [[Go through the northern door|c15north]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomC12]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><>

passages.name: RoomC14
passages.text:
Generator room
\ You are in a large room. You feel a strong air current. The noise of machinery whizzing and buzzing is almost deafening. There is a door in the western wall of the room. <>\ [[Check the generator|noisec14]] <>\ [[Check the source of the noise|noisec14]] <>\ [[Check the source of the draught|ventc14]] [[Go through the western door|RoomC12]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><>

links.text: Check the source of the noise
Check the source of the draught

passages.name: c14closed
passages.text: The door is locked. There is a smooth panel to the right of the door. <> [[Use your keycard|c14unlockfalse]] <> [[Use Mulligan's keycard|c14unlock]] <>\ <>\ [[Back|RoomC12]]

passages.name: c14unlockfalse
passages.text: You put your keycard to the panel, but nothing happens. SANDRA: No access rights, I guess. [[Back|RoomC12]]

passages.name: c14unlock
passages.text: You put Jim Mulligan's keycard to the panel. The door opens. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomC14]] [[Back|RoomC12]]

passages.name: bourbonc13
passages.text: You spill some bourbon on the rock floor. <>\ [[Back|RoomC13]]

passages.name: c13listen
passages.text: Barely audible metallic thudding is coming from the south-east. A barely audible buzz is coming from the south-east. [[Back|RoomC13]]

passages.name: checkdoorc13
passages.text: This massive door, which takes up almost an entire wall of the room, is locked. There are numerous bulges and bends on its metal surface. <>\ <><>\ <>\ [[Examine the door panel|panelc13]] [[Back|RoomC13]]

passages.name: panelc13
passages.text: You find a panel with several buttons on one side of the door. The cover under the panel, which has a round hole, is locked and bent. SANDRA: Someone locked it in a hurry and used too much force. [[Try to open the door|trydoorc13]] [[Back|checkdoorc13]]

passages.name: trydoorc13
passages.text: Pressing the buttons on the panel has no effect. [[Back|checkdoorc13]]

passages.name: noisec14
passages.text: <>\ The noise comes from a massive, metal piece of machinery, which takes up most of the eastern part of the room. Its housing is almost perfectly flat, apart from a small door, which is about one meter high. <>\ <> SANDRA: This must be the main generator. <>\ <>\ <> [[Examine the space behind the generator door|genniche]] <> [[Open the generator door|gendoor]] <>\ [[Step back from the generator|RoomC14]]

links.text: Examine the space behind the generator door

passages.name: genniche
passages.text: You cautiously reach into the opening and locate a lever switch. [[Switch the lever|genreset]] [[Back|noisec14]]

passages.name: gendoor
passages.text: <> The socket wrench you found fits the hole in the door perfectly. You struggle with the lock for a while, but finally you manage to open the door. <>\ [[Back|noisec14]] <> The door is locked and has no handle, only a round socket. SANDRA: I need some tool to open that. [[Back|noisec14]] <>

passages.name: genreset
passages.text: <>SANDRA: I've already reset the system. There's no need to fiddle with it and risk an electrocution. [[Back|noisec14]] <>You pull the lever. The noise dies down and the airflow stops. <>You wait a while and switch the lever back. The generator springs back to life.<> <>SANDRA: I've restarted it, just like Odys said. I hope he was right and this is really going to help us.<> <>\ <>[[Back|noisec14]]<> <>

passages.name: ventc14
passages.text: You go along the arching wall and reach the place where the draught is the strongest. The source of the airflow is somewhere close to the ceiling. SANDRA: At least the ventilation is working. But I'm not going to take my mask off. [[Back|RoomC14]]

passages.name: liftc15
passages.text: <>The lift door slides open when you push the button. You put forward one foot to make sure the cabin is behind the door. [[Go up in the lift|IntroD]] [[Move away from the lift|RoomC15]] <>The lift door is locked. This most likely means there is no cabin behind it. [[Try to call the lift|c15nolift]] [[Move away from the lift|RoomC15]] <>The lift door is locked. This most likely means there is no cabin behind it. Near the lift door you step on some object. SANDRA: Odys said he would be able to bring the lift down here if I reset the main generator. [[Examine the object on the floor|takewrench]] [[Try to call the lift|c15nolift]] [[Move away from the lift|RoomC15]] <>

links.text: Examine the object on the floor

passages.name: IntroD
passages.text: ODYS: It's good to see you again, Sandra. We are in section II of the station, and I regained access to most systems. This means I can support you in many more ways now. <>SANDRA: Did you send the distress call?<> <>ODYS: Unfortunately, even though you removed the lockdown, I still can't do that. To send the signal, one has to press the confirmation button on a console in the command centre, and I have no hands.<> <>SANDRA: What? This is unbelievably stupid! What if everyone… if I lost consciousness? You must be able to call help!<> <>ODYS: I fully agree with you, but it wasn't me who programmed the system. Such are the applicable regulations, which OSMiC must follow. Right or wrong, questioning them will not help us now. You must find the code. Under normal circumstances I could share it with you, but there were some... complications. Fortunately, there is one place where you can obtain the code – Sasha Zinov's computer. Zinov locked it, so that remote access is impossible.<> <>[[Zinov… our IT specialist? Why did he lock his computer?|IntroD2]]<>

links.text: Zinov… our IT specialist? Why did he lock his computer?

passages.name: c15nolift
passages.text: Whichever button you press, nothing happens. [[Back|liftc15]]

passages.name: takewrench
passages.text: You bend down and pick up the object. It's a socket wrench. Item received: Socket wrench <>\ [[Back|liftc15]]

passages.name: wrench
passages.text: A heavy wrench with a long handle. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: c15north
passages.text: The door is locked. SANDRA: There's nothing for me in the further tunnels anyway. [[Back|RoomC15]]

passages.name: IntroD2
passages.text: ODYS: When the Outworlders attacked, he panicked. Desperately trying to save himself, he escaped to his office, locked the door and cut off all communication with the rest of the facility. <>SANDRA: But what for?<> <>ODYS: He wasn't thinking logically. He believed isolation could make him safe if the aliens got on the station. But it didn't save him from the gas. You shouldn't think ill of Sasha. Blind fear is an impulse few people can resist. It's an evolutionary adaptation.<> <>SANDRA: But that just doesn't seem like him at all. He used to be so composed – or so I remember.<> <>ODYS: That's true, but he's never found himself in such dire circumstances before. Anyway, we better not waste any more time on such considerations, Sandra. Sasha is dead, but you can still save yourself. You must reach Zinov's office. We're now in section II, where the crew quarters are – you should know its plan well.<> <>SANDRA: I remember some places, like my room, but not the plan of the whole section.<> <>ODYS: Don't worry, Sandra. I'll try to fill in the gaps. <> <>ODYS: Sasha's office is located in the north-western part of this section. You should head that way. You'll meet certain obstacles on your way, but we'll worry about those when the time's right.<> <>[[Got it. Let's go, then.|RoomD1]] [[Before I go, I want to ask you some questions.|IntroD3]]<>

links.text: Before I go, I want to ask you some questions.

passages.name: RoomD1
passages.text:
<>
Lift room
\ <>\ <> It's really cold in this part of the station, even though you feel the still air, which means the ventilation is not working. <>\ <>\ ODYS: You are in a large room. In its centre there is a lift shaft. The room is mostly empty. Pipe stacks are running under the ceiling and by the walls. The only door in the room leads west. [[Why is it so cold in here?|coldask]] [[Go down in the lift|takeliftd1]] <> [[Remove fuses from the lift control panel|takefusesd1]] <>\ <>\ [[Go through the western door|RoomD2]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Lift room
\ <>\ <> It's really cold in this part of the station, even though you feel the still air, meaning the ventilation is not working. <>\ <>\ <>ODYS: You are in a large room. In its centre there is a lift shaft. The room is mostly empty. Pipe stacks are running under the ceiling and by the walls. The only door in the room leads west.<> <>[[Why is it so cold in here?|coldask]] [[Go down in the lift|takeliftd1]] <> [[Remove fuses from the lift control panel|takefusesd1]] <>\ <>\ [[Go through the western door|RoomD2]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <> <>

links.text: Why is it so cold in here?
Remove fuses from the lift control panel

passages.name: IntroD3
passages.text: ODYS: Of course. [[What's the situation in this section? You said the damage was greatest here.|IntroD3_1]] [[Was Sasha the one who cut you off from the control systems, Odys?|IntroD3_2]] [[You haven't asked me how I feel in a while.|IntroD3_3]] [[Can you tell me how the rooms are arranged in this section?|IntroD3_4]] [[I have no more questions.|RoomD1]]

links.text: What's the situation in this section? You said the damage was greatest here.
Was Sasha the one who cut you off from the control systems, Odys?
You haven't asked me how I feel in a while.
Can you tell me how the rooms are arranged in this section?

passages.name: IntroD3_1
passages.text: ODYS: The southern part is in ruin. There's no way of getting through it. The northern part of the section seems to have suffered less damage, but the lock reading to the northern corridor is frozen. SANDRA: Frozen? How is that possible? ODYS: There is a room used for storing refrigerant tanks just behind the lock. Damage to the tanks unsealed them and escaping refrigerant caused local icing. We need to find a way of defrosting the lock. <>\ [[Back|IntroD3B]]

passages.name: IntroD3_2
passages.text: ODYS: Yes. He accidentally blocked most of my access rights when he was cutting of the systems. Fortunately, you were able to undo this. [[Earlier you told me that you had suffered in the attack.|IntroD3_2_1]] [[Back|IntroD3B]]

links.text: Earlier you told me that you had suffered in the attack.

passages.name: IntroD3_3
passages.text: ODYS: And how are you feeling? SANDRA: Better, thanks. The stickiness in the lungs is gone, and my memory is coming back. If I could see, I'd manage to find my way through this section, I think. ODYS: That's great news, Sandra. I'm glad to hear that. [[Back|IntroD3B]]

passages.name: IntroD3_4
passages.text: ODYS: Section II is shaped like an equal-armed cross, with two main corridors intersecting. You're at the end of the eastern arm now. In this part there's the bathroom, a large storage room and Dr. Romani's laboratory. In the southern part the crew quarters are located. That area has suffered the greatest damage. Some rooms may be inaccessible. SANDRA: I remember my room was in the south, near the main intersection. ODYS: The western part contains more private quarters, the canteen and the gym. In the north there are some technical rooms and Sasha Zinov's office. [[Back|IntroD3B]]

passages.name: IntroD3B
passages.text: [[What's the situation in this section? You said the damage was greatest here.|IntroD3_1]] [[Was Sasha the one who cut you off from the control systems, Odys?|IntroD3_2]] [[You haven't asked me how I feel in a while.|IntroD3_3]] [[Can you tell me how the rooms are arranged in this section?|IntroD3_4]] [[I have no more questions.|RoomD1]]

links.text: What's the situation in this section? You said the damage was greatest here.
Was Sasha the one who cut you off from the control systems, Odys?
You haven't asked me how I feel in a while.
Can you tell me how the rooms are arranged in this section?

passages.name: IntroD3_2_1
passages.text: ODYS: I decided the reason behind my limitations is not important. Also, I didn't want to speak ill of Sasha. If the reset had granted me access rights to the code, there would have been no need to mention his insanity at all. Unfortunately, his computer is still locked, so I had to tell you about what happened. Still, his panic was caused by the attack. So I was telling the truth, from a certain point of view. [[I understand.|IntroD3B]] [[I'd be happier if you told me just the truth and let me have my own point of view.|IntroD3_2_2]]

links.text: I'd be happier if you told me just the truth and let me have my own point of view.

passages.name: IntroD3_2_2
passages.text: ODYS: Of course. I am sorry; now I see I could have been wrong, but I only did what I believed was tactful and appropriate. [[Back|IntroD3B]]

passages.name: coldask
passages.text: ODYS: That's because refrigerant is leaking from the tanks in the northern part of the section. [[Back|RoomD1]]

passages.name: takeliftd1
passages.text: <>ODYS: The lift won't move without the fuses. There's no reason to go back there, anyway. <>ODYS: There's no reason to go back there, Sandra. <>\ [[Back|RoomD1]]

passages.name: takefusesd1
passages.text: You open the lift control panel and remove two fuses. Item received: Fuse Item received: Fuse ODYS: All right – now you can start the lift to section I. <>\ <>\ <>\ [[Back|RoomD1]]

passages.text:
<>
Section II eastern corridor, eastern part
\ ODYS: You are in the eastern corridor of section II. Some of the lamps aren't working, but other than that, there's no visible damage here. The corridor goes west. There are also three doors here: to the north, to the east and to the south. [[Go west|RoomD3]] <> [[Go through the northern door|RoomD4]] <> [[Go through the northern door|goingtobath]] <>\ [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD1]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD5]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>

[[Go east|RoomD2]] <> [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] <> [[Go through the lock|eastlock]] <>\ [[Go through the northern door|RoomD6]] <> [[Go through the southern door|RoomD7]] <> [[Go through the southern door|labclosed]] <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>

passages.name: RoomD4
passages.text:
<>\ <><>\ <>\
Bathroom
\ You enter the room. The door closes behind you. You are standing on a broad floor grate, which must be covering a drain. You hear water dripping from above. The air smells of cigarette smoke. [[Examine the dripping noise|bathdrip]] [[Search the room|bathsearch]] [[Examine the source of the smell|bathsmell]] <> [[Leave the bathroom|RoomD2]] <> [[Leave the bathroom|bathask]] <>\

links.text: Examine the source of the smell

passages.name: goingtobath
passages.text: <>ODYS: Wait, Sandra. That's the bathroom – obviously, there are no cameras or microphones there, so I won't be able to see or hear you. There's no need for you to go there and risk some accident. [[Thanks for the warning. You're right, I shouldn't go there if I don't have to. (stay in the corridor)|RoomD2]] [[Let's not be overly cautious. It's just a bathroom. I want to search it – maybe I'll find something useful. (enter the bathroom)|RoomD4]] [[Didn't it cross your mind that maybe I just need to use the toilet?|needtoilet]] <>ODYS: Wait, Sandra. That's the bathroom – obviously, there are no cameras or microphones there, so I won't be able to see or hear you. There's no need for you to go there and risk some accident. <>[[Thanks for the warning. You're right, I shouldn't go there if I don't have to. (stay in the corridor)|RoomD2]] [[Let's not be overly cautious. It's just a bathroom. I want to search it – maybe I'll find something useful. (enter the bathroom)|RoomD4]] [[Didn't it cross your mind that maybe I just need to use the toilet?|needtoilet]]<> <> <>

Didn't it cross your mind that maybe I just need to use the toilet?

passages.name: RoomD5
passages.text:
<>
Storage room
\ ODYS: You are in a room used as a storage area. Large metal containers are standing against the walls. Near one of the containers there is a space suit, complete with a helmet. The containers are covered in a thick layer of dust. The only door in the room leads north. [[Examine the containers|checkcontainers]] [[Examine the space suit|checksuit]] [[Go through the northern door|RoomD2]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Storage room

passages.name: bathdrip
passages.text: You move forward towards the source of the dripping. A moment later you feel cold water falling on your head and dripping under your collar. SANDRA: A pipe under the ceiling is leaking. [[Back|RoomD4]]

passages.name: bathsearch
passages.text: It takes you quite some time to examine the entire bathroom. Unfortunately, you don't find anything useful. [[Back|RoomD4]]

passages.name: bathsmell
passages.text: The smell isn't coming from one particular place. It's faint, but omnipresent. SANDRA: Jim Mulligan used to smoke in the bathroom... he even lost his lighter here. He was so mad about that… [[Back|RoomD4]]

passages.name: bathask
passages.text: ODYS: Did you find anything useful in the bathroom? SANDRA: Nothing at all. You were right, it was just a waste of time. <>\ [[Next|RoomD2]]

passages.name: needtoilet
passages.text: <>ODYS: And do you need to? SANDRA: Errr... No. ODYS: In that case, I advise against going there. [[Thanks for the warning. You're right, I shouldn't go there if I don't have to. (stay in the corridor)|RoomD2]] [[Let's not be overly cautious. It's just a bathroom. I want to search it – maybe I'll find something useful. (enter the bathroom)|RoomD4]] <>ODYS: And do you need to? <>SANDRA: Errr... No.<> <>ODYS: In that case, I advise against going there.<> <>[[Thanks for the warning. You're right, I shouldn't go there if I don't have to. (stay in the corridor)|RoomD2]] [[Let's not be overly cautious. It's just a bathroom. I want to search it – maybe I'll find something useful. (enter the bathroom)|RoomD4]]<> <> <>

links.text: Thanks for the warning. You're right, I shouldn't go there if I don't have to. (stay in the corridor)
Let's not be overly cautious. It's just a bathroom. I want to search it – maybe I'll find something useful. (enter the bathroom)

Glass shards litter the floor. Near the eastern lock, just under the ceiling, there is a metal hatch on the wall. It leads to a ventilation duct. There is a ladder on the wall, reaching the hatch. The hatch is open. <> ODYS: You are in the main intersection, exactly in the middle of section II. It's an octagonal room with massive locks in the northern, eastern, southern and western wall. passages.name: eastlock
passages.text: ODYS: It's emergency-locked. <>SANDRA: Can I use my card?<> <>ODYS: You don't need to. Thanks to the reset, I can control most doors in this section. Wait a moment – here you go.<> <>You hear the lock rising slowly.<> <>\ <>[[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Back|RoomD3]]<>

passages.name: RoomD6
passages.text:
<>
Boiler room
\ ODYS: You are in a large room. Pipes, running both vertically and horizontally, take up most of the space here. There is a valve panel on the wall, used for controlling the water flow, ventilation and heating. In the north-eastern corner of the room, next to a pipe stack going through the floor, there is a trapdoor. The only door in the room leads south. [[Examine the valves|valvesd6]] [[Examine the trapdoor|hatchd6]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD3]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>

passages.text:
<>\ <>\ <><>\ <>\
Dr. Romani's laboratory
\ <>ODYS: You are in the laboratory. The walls and floor are laid with white tiles. High up on the eastern wall there is the opening of the ventilation duct. Underneath, and somewhat to the left, there is a large automatic cart with a coffee machine on it. Against the western wall there is a long table. On the table there is a computer monitor, a complicated laboratory apparatus and some glassware. There are also some notes on the table. On a chair by the table there is a body of a woman, dressed in a white lab coat, with her head on the computer keyboard. Against the eastern wall there are several lab cabinets, housing glassware and reagents. <>ODYS: You are in the laboratory. The walls and floor are laid with white tiles. High up on the eastern wall there is the opening of the ventilation duct. Against the western wall there is a long table. On a chair by the table there is a body of a woman, dressed in a white lab coat, with her head on the computer keyboard. Against the eastern wall there are several lab cabinets, housing glassware and reagents. <>ODYS: You are in the laboratory. The walls and floor are laid with white tiles. High up on the eastern wall there is the opening of the ventilation duct, through which you came in. Underneath, and somewhat to the left, there is a large automatic cart with a coffee machine on it. On a chair by the table there is a body of a woman, dressed in a white lab coat, with her head on the computer keyboard. Against the eastern wall there are several lab cabinets, housing glassware and reagents. The only door in this room leads north. It's locked, and there's a glowing red sign above which says "Experiment in progress". <>\ <>\ <> [[Examine the door|checklabdoor]] <>\ <>\ <> [[This woman must be Doctor Romani?|askromani]] <>\ <> [[Examine the cart and the coffee machine|checkcoffeemach]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Program the cart|programcartd]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Make yourself a coffee|makecoffee]] <>\ <>\ [[Examine the laboratory apparatus|checklabeq]] <> [[About the experiment...|moreaboutexp]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Complete Dr. Romani's experiment|dothescience]] <>\ <>\ [[Examine the body on the chair|searchromani]] [[Examine the cabinets|checkreagents]] <> [[Go through the northern door|RoomD3]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts|chuteno]] <> [[Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts|RoomD8]] <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <><>\ <><>\ <>\

On a chair by the table there is a body of a woman, dressed in a white lab coat, with her head on the computer keyboard. Against the eastern wall there are several lab cabinets, housing glassware and reagents. The only door in this room leads north. It's locked, and there's a glowing red sign above which says "Experiment in progress". <>\ <><>\ <> [[Examine the door|checklabdoor]] <>\ <>\ <> [[This woman must be Doctor Romani?|askromani]] <>\ <> [[Examine the cart and the coffee machine|checkcoffeemach]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Program the cart|programcartd]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Make yourself a coffee|makecoffee]] <>\ <>\ [[Examine the laboratory apparatus|checklabeq]] <> [[About the experiment...|moreaboutexp]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Complete Dr. Romani's experiment|dothescience]] <>\ <>\ [[Examine the body on the chair|searchromani]] [[Examine the cabinets|checkreagents]] <> [[Go through the northern door|RoomD3]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts|chuteno]] <> [[Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts|RoomD8]] <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

links.text: This woman must be Doctor Romani?
Examine the cart and the coffee machine
Examine the body on the chair
Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts
Get to the central intersection through ventilation ducts

passages.name: labclosed
passages.text: The door is locked. [[Can you open it, Odys?|canyouopenlab]] [[Back|RoomD3]]

passages.name: canyouopenlab
passages.text: ODYS: I'm trying, but the system denies me access. This is the door to the laboratory. There's a glowing red sign above which says "Experiment in progress". SANDRA: Yes, I remember – there was this security lock thing. When Doctor Romani was using that huge machine, no one could enter or leave the lab. ODYS: If you want to get there, you must find another way. Maybe you'll be able to get in through the ventilation ducts – the camera in the laboratory shows a duct opening under the ceiling. [[Back|RoomD3]]

passages.name: checkcontainers
passages.text: ODYS: These are massive, metal containers, used to transport provisions to the facility. Containers in this room contain supplies for the staff, like food and clothes. SANDRA: Can I open them somehow? ODYS: The covers are too heavy to raise by hand. Normally, specialised robots perform the task. [[Back|RoomD5]]

passages.name: checksuit
passages.text: <>ODYS: It's a hard suit designed to cover the entire body. It's used when going outside the station. [[Back|RoomD5]] <>ODYS: It's a hard suit designed to cover the entire body. It's used when going outside the station. It hasn't been used in a while, but someone's been doing maintenance on it recently and replaced one of the elastic tubes. The old tube is still lying on the floor, near the suit. [[Take the elastic tube|taketube]] [[Back|RoomD5]] <>

passages.name: taketube
passages.text: You pick up a piece of tube. It feels brittle, but isn't torn. Item received: Elastic tube <>\ [[Back|RoomD5]]

passages.name: tube
passages.text: A short elastic tube, which used to be part of a space suit. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: valvesd6
passages.text: ODYS: All valves are in their normal, open positions. According to the message on a display next to the panel, the heating is malfunctioning and is working in backup mode. SANDRA: I'd better not touch that. [[Back|RoomD6]]

passages.name: hatchd6
passages.text: ODYS: It's a service trapdoor, leading to the northern tunnels. There is no reason to go down there, and it could even be dangerous – explosives are stored in one of the rooms. [[Back|RoomD6]]

passages.name: askvent
passages.text: ODYS: They run through most of the facility. The northern duct is blocked, but you could get to Doctor Romani's laboratory through the southern duct. [[Back|RoomD8]]

passages.name: askhatch
passages.text: <>ODYS: I don't see it in the system... but I have an idea how to open it. SANDRA: Let me guess – this won't be easy. ODYS: No, it's nothing complicated, in fact. Duct covers have integrated receivers which open them automatically when time for cleaning the duct comes. Cleaning is done by specialised robots. SANDRA: So if I find one of these robots and bring it here, the cover will open. Isn't there a more direct method? Like a handle on the cover? ODYS: No, unfortunately not. Normally I could open the cover remotely. But it's impossible now due to a malfunction. [[Back|RoomD8]] <>ODYS: I don't see it in the system... but I have an idea how to open it. <>SANDRA: Let me guess – this won't be easy.<> <>ODYS: No, it's nothing complicated, in fact. Duct covers have integrated receivers which open them automatically when time for cleaning the duct comes. Cleaning is done by specialised robots.<> <>SANDRA: So if I find one of these robots and bring it here, the cover will open. Isn't there a more direct method? Like a handle on the cover?<> <>ODYS: No, unfortunately not. Normally I could open the cover remotely. But it's impossible now due to a malfunction.<> <>[[Back|RoomD8]]<> <>\ <>

passages.name: RoomD9
passages.text:
<>
Section II southern corridor, northern part
 ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. This part of the corridor didn't suffer serious damage. Only the ceiling lamps are shattered. The corridor leads south to a spot where several floor panels have collapsed into a tunnel below. To the north there is a lock. There is one door on the eastern side of the corridor and another one on the western side. [[Go south|RoomD10]] <> [[Go through the western door|RoomD12]] <> [[Go through the western door|opensandrasroom]] <>\ <> [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD13]] <> [[Go through the eastern door|opensantosroom]] <>\ [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II southern corridor, northern part
 ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. This part of the corridor didn't suffer serious damage. Only the ceiling lamps are shattered. The corridor leads south to a spot where several floor panels have collapsed into a tunnel below. To the north there is a lock. There is one door on the eastern side of the corridor and another one on the western side. <>[[Go south|RoomD10]] <> [[Go through the western door|RoomD12]] <> [[Go through the western door|opensandrasroom]] <>\ <> [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD13]] <> [[Go through the eastern door|opensantosroom]] <>\ [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: opensouthlock
passages.text: ODYS: Wait – I'll open the lock for you. Done. A word of caution before you head south. Structural damage is extensive there. There is a huge gap in the floor in one place, some ceiling panels barely hold in place and several rooms have practically collapsed. I will warn you about every danger, but be cautious all the time – with no exceptions. <>\ [[Go through the lock|RoomD9]] [[Back|RoomD8]]

passages.name: RoomD19
passages.text:
<>
Section II western corridor, eastern part
\ ODYS: You are in the western corridor of section II. The corridor goes west. There is a door to the north and another one to the south. To the east there is a lock. [[Go west|RoomD20]] [[Go through the northern door|RoomD21]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD22]] [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II western corridor, eastern part
\ ODYS: You are in the western corridor of section II. The corridor goes west. There is a door to the north and another one to the south. To the east there is a lock. <>[[Go west|RoomD20]] [[Go through the northern door|RoomD21]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD22]] [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>\

passages.name: openwestlock
passages.text: ODYS: On the other side of this airlock there are the quarters of some crew members and common rooms – the canteen and the gym. I'll open the lock for you. <>\ [[Go through the lock|RoomD19]] [[Back|RoomD8]]

passages.name: RoomD15
passages.text:
<>
Section II northern corridor, southern part
\ It's so cold here you start to shiver. ODYS: You are in the northern corridor of section II. The floor here is covered in hoar frost. The only door in this part of the corridor is in the eastern wall, but it's completely iced over. The corridor goes north. To the south there is a lock. [[Examine the iced door|frozendoor]] [[Go north|RoomD16]] [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II northern corridor, southern part
\ It's so cold here you start to shiver. <>ODYS: You are in the northern corridor of section II. The floor here is covered in hoar frost. The only door in this part of the corridor is in the eastern wall, but it's completely iced over. The corridor goes north. To the south there is a lock.<> <>[[Examine the iced door|frozendoor]] [[Go north|RoomD16]] [[Go through the lock|RoomD8]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: lockisfrozen
passages.text: You touch the lock and immediately take back your hand – the metal is so cold it burns. ODYS: The lock is iced over. There's a layer of ice on the other side, which makes raising the lock impossible. We need to find a way of melting the ice. [[Can't you just turn up the heating?|askheating]] [[Why is the lock iced over?|asklockfrozen]] [[Do you know how to defrost the lock?|howthawlock]] [[Back|RoomD8]]

links.text: Can't you just turn up the heating?
Why is the lock iced over?
Do you know how to defrost the lock?

passages.name: askheating
passages.text: ODYS: It's set on full power – which, in its current state, is really low. It will melt the ice eventually, but it may take many hours. We can't afford to wait this long. [[Back|lockisfrozen]]

passages.name: asklockfrozen
passages.text: ODYS: Just behind the lock there's a room used to store refrigerant tanks. The tanks must have unsealed and escaping refrigerant caused ice buildup. [[Back|lockisfrozen]]

passages.name: howthawlock
passages.text: ODYS: The best way would be to find a powerful heating device, but that's impossible, I'm afraid. Enough boiling water should also melt the ice. [[Back|lockisfrozen]]

passages.name: programcartd
passages.text: ODYS: You can send the cart to a particular spot in this section. <>\ <> [[Go to the central intersection|$return][$coffeecartlocation to 'D8']] <>\ <>\ <> [[Go to the canteen|$return][$coffeecartlocation to 'D22']] <>\ <>\ <> [[Go to the laboratory|$return][$coffeecartlocation to 'D7']] <>\ [[Back|$return]]

passages.name: unfreezestart
passages.text: <>\ <>SANDRA: This could actually work. <>\ <>\ [[Turn on the coffee machine|coffeeon]] <> [[Place the cup in the machine|putcupin]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Cut a hole in the cup|cuthole]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Put tube through the hole in the cup|mounttube]] <>\ <>\ [[Back|RoomD8]]

links.text: Place the cup in the machine
Cut a hole in the cup
Put tube through the hole in the cup

passages.name: coffeeon
passages.text: <> Boiling water pours from the tube and on the bottom edge of the lock. <>SANDRA: I hope this works.<> <>You wait several minutes, during which a pool of steaming water grows on the floor.<> <>ODYS: The ice freezing the lock in place has melted! Now I can open the way.<> <>SANDRA: Coffee machine. A most brilliant invention.<> <>Wading in the warm water, you switch off the machine.<> <>\ <>[[Back|RoomD8]]<> <> Boiling water pours into the cup and out of the hole. SANDRA: That's something, but I still have to direct the stream onto the lock. Otherwise I'll just waste water. You turn off the coffee machine. [[Back|RoomD8]] <> You turn on the machine. The cup fills with boiling water. SANDRA: The machine fills the cup and switches off. I won't defrost the lock by pouring water cup by cup. I need to find a way of cheating the fill level sensor. You empty the cup. [[Back|RoomD8]] <> You turn on the machine, but nothing happens. SANDRA: I forgot – it's equipped with a sensor. Water won't run unless there's a cup in the machine. [[Back|RoomD8]] <>

passages.name: cup
passages.text: A standard cup for hot and cold drinks. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: knife
passages.text: A small, but really sharp knife. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: putcupin
passages.text: You place the cup in the machine. Item lost: Plastic cup <><><>\ [[Back|unfreezestart]]

passages.name: cuthole
passages.text: You cut a round hole in the side of the cup. <>\ [[Back|unfreezestart]]

passages.name: mounttube
passages.text: You push one end of the tube into the hole in the cup. SANDRA: Now I just need to point the other end at the lock... like this. Item lost: Elastic tube <><><>\ [[Back|unfreezestart]]

passages.name: makecoffee
passages.text: <>SANDRA: I could really use a cup of coffee. ODYS: The start button is on the ri– I see you don't need any help. SANDRA: No, that's one thing I remember. I hope this cup is more or less clean. You drink a cup of hot, strong coffee. It makes you feel better. <>\ [[Back|$return]] <>SANDRA: I think I need another one. Another cup of coffee makes you feel energised. <>\ [[Back|$return]] <>SANDRA: One more won't hurt me. The third cup makes your head clearer. ODYS: I'm not sure if you should drink so much coffee in your current state... SANDRA: Take it easy. That was the last one. And I really needed that. <><>\ [[Back|$return]] <>SANDRA: Tempting, but I shouldn't overdo it. [[Back|$return]] <>

passages.name: openhatch
passages.text: You climb the ladder, with the robot in your backpack. You hear the duct cover open. ODYS: It worked! You should be able to get into the duct – the opening is right above the ladder. The duct is low, you'll have to move on your hands and knees. Go right from here – you'll reach the exit in the laboratory. <>\ [[Get to the laboratory through the ventilation duct|RoomD7]] [[Back|RoomD8]]

links.text: Get to the laboratory through the ventilation duct

passages.name: RoomD10
passages.text:
<>
Section II southern corridor, the breach
 <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You're close to a gaping breach in the floor. <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You're close to a gaping breach in the floor. You can walk around it if you stay very close to the eastern wall. Be careful – the breach itself is not that deep, but there are electrical cables running down there, and falling floor panels have damaged the insulation on some of them. If you fall into the breach, electrocution will kill you. <>\ [[Go north|RoomD9]] <> [[Go south|RoomD11]] <> [[Walk around the breach to the south|crossd10]] <>\ <> [[Examine the door on the eastern side of the corridor|2checkambdoor]] <>\ <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II southern corridor, the breach
 <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You're close to a gaping breach in the floor. <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You're close to a gaping breach in the floor. You can walk around it if you stay very close to the eastern wall. Be careful – the breach itself is not that deep, but there are electrical cables running down there, and falling floor panels have damaged the insulation on some of them. If you fall into the breach, electrocution will kill you. <>\ <>[[Go north|RoomD9]] <> [[Go south|RoomD11]] <> [[Walk around the breach to the south|crossd10]] <>\ <> [[Examine the door on the eastern side of the corridor|2checkambdoor]] <>\ <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <> <>

links.text: Walk around the breach to the south
Examine the door on the eastern side of the corridor

passages.name: RoomD12
passages.text:
<>
Sandra's room
 ODYS: You are in your own room. There's a bed and a desk here. There are many loose, handwritten notes on the desk, and a computer, which is switched on. The door is in the eastern wall of the room. [[Examine the notes on the desk|ownnnotes]] [[Examine the computer|sandrasPC]] [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD9]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Sandra's room
 ODYS: You are in your own room. There's a bed and a desk here. There are many loose, handwritten notes on the desk, and a computer, which is switched on. The door is in the eastern wall of the room. <>[[Examine the notes on the desk|ownnnotes]] [[Examine the computer|sandrasPC]] [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD9]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

links.text: Examine the notes on the desk

passages.name: opensandrasroom
passages.text: ODYS: This door leads to your room. I'll open it for you. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomD12]] [[Back|RoomD9]]

passages.name: RoomD13
passages.text:
<>
Dr. Santos' Room
 ODYS: You are in Doctor Maria Santos' room. In addition to a bed and a desk with a computer on it, there is a large aquarium here, in the corner of the room. The door is in the western wall of the room. [[Examine the desk|santosdesk]] [[Examine the aquarium|checkfishtank]] [[Go through the western door|RoomD9]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Dr. Santos' Room
 ODYS: You are in Doctor Maria Santos' room. In addition to a bed and a desk with a computer on it, there is a large aquarium here, in the corner of the room. The door is in the western wall of the room. <>[[Examine the desk|santosdesk]] [[Examine the aquarium|checkfishtank]] [[Go through the western door|RoomD9]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: opensantosroom
passages.text: ODYS: This door leads to Doctor Maria Santos' room. I'll open it for you. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomD13]] [[Back|RoomD9]]

passages.name: RoomD11
passages.text:
<>
Section II southern corridor, southern part
 <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You can't go further south – the ceiling is collapsed. To the north there is a gaping breach in the floor. <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You can't go further south – the ceiling is collapsed. In the pile of rubble there is a small robot, partially buried under one of the collapsed panels. To the north there is a gaping breach in the floor. <>\ [[What's further south?|asksouth]] <>\ <> [[Examine the robot|checkcleaningrobot]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Pick up the robot|takerobot]] <>\ [[Go north|RoomD10]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II southern corridor, southern part
 <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You can't go further south – the ceiling is collapsed. To the north there is a gaping breach in the floor. <>ODYS: You are in the southern corridor of section II. You can't go further south – the ceiling is collapsed. In the pile of rubble there is a small robot, partially buried under one of the collapsed panels. To the north there is a gaping breach in the floor. <>\ <>[[What's further south?|asksouth]] <>\ <> [[Examine the robot|checkcleaningrobot]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Pick up the robot|takerobot]] <>\ [[Go north|RoomD10]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>\

passages.name: crossd10
passages.text: You move along the breach – slowly, with your back against the wall. Suddenly your hand touches a closed door. Next to the door there is a metal plaque and a keycard panel. You can heat a rhythmic, beeping sound coming through the door. [[Continue south|d10crossed]] [[What door is this?|askambdoor]]

passages.name: d10crossed
passages.text: You reach the southern end of the breach. <>\ [[Next|RoomD11]]

passages.name: checkambdoor
passages.text: SANDRA: Can you open this door, Odys? ODYS: No. It's emergency locked – some machines in the room started malfunctioning badly after the system failure, which makes them even more dangerous. It would be foolish, and deadly dangerous, to try to get into that room. <> [[Use your keycard|tryopenamb]] <> [[Use Mulligan's keycard|tryopenamb]] <>\ <>\ [[Is there any other door here?|anotherdoor]] [[Continue south|d10crossed]]

links.text: Is there any other door here?

passages.name: askambdoor
passages.text: ODYS: It leads to a robot maintenance room. There's machinery in there which could be really dangerous for a blind person. A sign by the door warns about the danger and restricts access to authorised persons only. <>\ [[Examine the door to the robot maintenance room|checkambdoor]] [[Continue south|d10crossed]]

links.text: Examine the door to the robot maintenance room

passages.name: tryopenamb
passages.text: You put the card to the panel, but nothing happens. ODYS: You can't open this door with a keycard. And, really, you shouldn't try. That place is dangerous. [[Back|checkambdoor]]

passages.name: anotherdoor
passages.text: ODYS: Yes, in the western wall. It leads to Doctor Romani's quarters. But it opens straight to the breach now – there's no way of getting to that room. I suppose it's devastated anyway – the camera, at least, was destroyed. [[Back|checkambdoor]]

passages.name: 2checkambdoor
passages.text: <>ODYS: I don't understand your fascination with that door, Sandra. You have no reason to enter the robot maintenance room. Luckily for us, because that would be tremendously dangerous. <>ODYS: This door leads to a robot maintenance room. There's machinery in there which could be really dangerous for a blind person. A sign by the door warns about the danger and restricts access to authorised persons only. SANDRA: Can you open this door, Odys? ODYS: No. It's emergency locked – some machines in the room started malfunctioning badly after the system failure, which makes them even more dangerous. It would be foolish, and deadly dangerous, to try to get into that room. <>\ <>\ <> [[Use your keycard|2tryopenamb]] <> [[Use Mulligan's keycard|2tryopenamb]] <> [[Use Dr. Santos' keycard|openamb]] <> [[Use keycard found on Sasha's desk|openamb]] <>\ <>\ [[Is there any other door here?|2anotherdoor]] [[Back|RoomD10]]

links.text: Use keycard found on Sasha's desk
Is there any other door here?

passages.name: 2tryopenamb
passages.text: You put the keycard to the panel, but nothing happens. ODYS: You can't open this door with a keycard. And, really, you shouldn't try. That place is dangerous. [[Back|2checkambdoor]]

passages.name: 2anotherdoor
passages.text: ODYS: Yes, in the western wall. It leads to Doctor Romani's quarters. But it opens straight to the breach now – there's no way of getting to that room. I suppose it's devastated anyway – the camera, at least, was destroyed. [[Back|2checkambdoor]]

passages.name: openamb
passages.text: You put the keycard to the panel. You hear a beep and the door opens. <>ODYS: Sandra, listen to me, please. This is not the time for jokes – and dangerous ones. [[Close the door and move away|RoomD10]] [[Go through the door|RoomD14]] <>ODYS: Sandra, wait. Just hear me out. Zinov somehow hacked this card to work, but in doing so, he violated all safety requirements. You should not be able to unlock this door. The room behind it is full of malfunctioning maintenance equipment. Going there can kill you. <>\ [[Close the door and move away|RoomD10]] [[Go through the door|RoomD14]] <>

links.text: Close the door and move away

passages.name: RoomD14
passages.text:
<>
Robot maintenance centre
 You hear buzzing and beeping of machinery, with one, pulsating sound louder than the rest. The air smells of ozone. ODYS: You are in the robot maintenance centre. To the right from the door there is a cabin – it's an automatic lubricating station for humanoid service robots. Further in the room there are several charging stations. Due to the recent system failure their outputs are live and pose a lethal threat of electrocution. You should leave this room immediately, Sandra. I understand you are curious, but staying here is too risky. [[Leave the room|gladyouleft]] [[Examine the charging stations|goinside]] [[Examine the lubricating station|checkmedstation]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <>
Robot maintenance centre
 You hear buzzing and beeping of machinery, with one, pulsating sound louder than the rest. The air smells of ozone. <>ODYS: You are in the robot maintenance centre. To the right from the door there is a cabin – it's an automatic lubricating station for humanoid service robots. Further in the room there are several charging stations. Due to the recent system failure their outputs are live and pose a lethal threat of electrocution. You should leave this room immediately, Sandra. I understand you are curious, but staying here is too risky.<> <>[[Leave the room|gladyouleft]] [[Examine the charging stations|goinside]] [[Examine the lubricating station|checkmedstation]] [[Open inventory|Items]]<> <> <>

passages.name: sashadeskcard
passages.text: Keycard found on Sasha's desk. Raised letters on the card read "Maria Santos". <><>\ <><> <>\ <>\ [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: santoscard
passages.text: A keycard which belonged to Dr. Maria Santos. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: asksouth
passages.text: ODYS: Part of the crew quarters and the airlock to section III. [[Can I get through the cave-in somehow?|askgosouth]] [[Back|RoomD11]]

links.text: Can I get through the cave-in somehow?

passages.name: askgosouth
passages.text: ODYS: Such attempts would be unnecessary, and dangerous. [[Back|RoomD11]]

passages.name: checkcleaningrobot
passages.text: <>ODYS: It's a small robot, used for cleaning the rooms. A ceiling panel fell on it and crushed its back legs. It cannot move on its own. It helplessly scratches the floor with its front legs, trying to reach the stain. <>ODYS: It's a small robot, used for cleaning the rooms. A ceiling panel fell on it and crushed its back legs. It cannot move on its own. But it's still functional, although in standby mode. <>\ [[I remember these robots – they sometimes crawled on walls and ceilings.|robotwalk]] <>\ <> [[Do you know how to activate it?|askcleaningrobot]] <>\ <> [[Spill some bourbon near the robot|stainfloor]] <>\ <>\ [[Back|RoomD11]]

links.text: I remember these robots – they sometimes crawled on walls and ceilings.
Do you know how to activate it?
Spill some bourbon near the robot

passages.name: robotwalk
passages.text: ODYS: Yes, they do that. They clean ventilation ducts as well. Each robot has a signal emitter, so the vents open automatically for cleaning. You can use that to your advantage and open the vent in the central intersection. [[Back|checkcleaningrobot]]

passages.name: askcleaningrobot
passages.text: ODYS: It turns on automatically if it detects that its surroundings need cleaning. [[Back|checkcleaningrobot]]

passages.name: stainfloor
passages.text: You empty the bottle on the floor. You hear quiet squeaking. <>ODYS: The cleaning robot has turned on. It's trying to get to the stain.<> <>Item lost: Bottle of bourbon Item received: Empty bottle <><><><>\ [[Back|checkcleaningrobot]]<>

passages.name: emptybottle
passages.text: An empty bourbon bottle. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: backpack
passages.text: A textile backpack, found in the gym. Worn, but durable. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: takerobot
passages.text: <>You manage to push the robot into the backpack. The robot squeaks quietly, but offers no resistance. You put on the backpack. <>\ [[Back|RoomD11]] <>SANDRA: I can't carry it around in my arms. I need something to put it into. [[Back|RoomD11]] <>SANDRA: First I want to check if it turns on at all. [[Back|RoomD11]] <>

passages.name: ownnnotes
passages.text: <>SANDRA: I used to note down important work stuff. There was too much to remember. ODYS: Your notes are really thorough. I see many concerning chemistry and geology. My database shows this is your first job with OSMiC. I'm sure you had to learn a lot, both about your particular duties and general functioning of the facility. SANDRA: Well, there wasn't that much. I'm only an assistant. I mostly carried out Dr. Romani's orders. Simple, necessary tasks. [[Back|RoomD12]] <>SANDRA: I used to note down important work stuff. There was too much to remember. <>ODYS: Your notes are really thorough. I see many concerning chemistry and geology. My database shows this is your first job with OSMiC. I'm sure you had to learn a lot, both about your particular duties and general functioning of the facility.<> <>SANDRA: Well, there wasn't that much. I'm only an assistant. I mostly carried out Dr. Romani's orders. Simple, necessary tasks.<> <>Absent-mindedly rummaging through the notes, you suddenly touch some small object. You recognise a portable comm device.<> <>SANDRA: I was told to take it with me whenever I went to the exterior module. As usual, I forgot.<> <>Item received: Portable comm device [[Back|RoomD12]]<> <>\ <>

passages.name: comm
passages.text: A device which enables communication among the station crew. It has a recording function. There is a message recorded on the comm device. [[Play the message|messagelisten]] [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: messagelisten
passages.text: MARIA SANTOS: ...Sandra? Doctor Santos here. I'm going through my files and I've just noticed it's time for your periodic examination. Could you drop by the medical room on your way back from the module? I'll most likely have picked up my keycard from Sasha by then. If I'm not in the medical room, knock to my quarters' door... [[Back|comm]]

passages.name: sandrasPC
passages.text: ODYS: A scientific article is displayed on the screen. It goes into detail about rocks and minerals which build asteroids like this one. [[Back|RoomD12]]

passages.name: santosdesk
passages.text: ODYS: The computer is turned off. There's nothing else on the desk. [[Back|RoomD13]]

passages.name: checkfishtank
passages.text: ODYS: Small, blue jellyfish are floating in the cloudy water. SANDRA: Doctor Santos mentioned some studies she was conducting on marine life. She examined how the conditions on a space station influence these creatures, or something similar. I think she even received a grant. [[Are the jellyfish alive?|jellieslive]] [[Do you know what exactly Doctor Santos studied?|santosresearch]] [[Back|RoomD13]]

links.text: Do you know what exactly Doctor Santos studied?

passages.name: jellieslive
passages.text: ODYS: They are. Vulcanium doesn't dissolve in water, so it didn't kill them. [[Back|checkfishtank]]

passages.name: santosresearch
passages.text: ODYS: Yes, I have access to this information. She studied the effect of artificial gravity on bioluminescent jellyfish, which are a source of medicinally valuable chemicals. [[Back|checkfishtank]]

passages.name: RoomD20
passages.text:
Section II western corridor, western part
\ ODYS: You are in the western corridor of section II. The corridor goes east. There are doors to the north, to the south and to the west. <> <> [[Go through the western door|RoomD25]] <> [[Go through the western door|openmarshroom]] <>\ <> [[Go through the northern door|RoomD24]] <> [[Go through the northern door|opensasharoom]] <>\ <> [[Go through the southern door|RoomD23]] <> [[Go through the southern door|openmulliganroom]] <>\ [[Go east|RoomD19]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <> <>ODYS: There's nothing of interest for us in this part of the station. The doors lead to the private rooms of captain Robert Marsh, Sasha Zinov and Jim Mulligan. I advise you turn back.<> <>[[You're right, I've no reason to stay here.|RoomD19]] [[I want to check these rooms. Maybe I'll find something useful.|wanttocheck]] [[Stop telling me what to do. I thought you were supposed to help me, not order me around.|angrycheck]]<> <>

links.text: You're right, I've no reason to stay here.
I want to check these rooms. Maybe I'll find something useful.
Stop telling me what to do. I thought you were supposed to help me, not order me around.

passages.name: RoomD21
passages.text:
<>
Gym
\ This room smells of old sweat. <>ODYS: You are in the gym. The room is dark and quiet. There is various training equipment here. The only door leads south. <>ODYS: You are in the gym. The room is dark and quiet. There is various training equipment here. A bundle of some sort is lying under a bench in the corner. The only door leads south. <>\ [[Examine the training equipment|traineq]] <>\ <> [[Take the item from under the bench|takebackpack]] <>\ [[Go through the southern door|RoomD19]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Gym
\ This room smells of old sweat. <><>ODYS: You are in the gym. The room is dark and quiet. There is various training equipment here. The only door leads south. <>ODYS: You are in the gym. The room is dark and quiet. There is various training equipment here. A bundle of some sort is lying under a bench in the corner. The only door leads south. <>\<> <>[[Examine the training equipment|traineq]] <>\ <> [[Take the item from under the bench|takebackpack]] <>\ [[Go through the southern door|RoomD19]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>\

links.text: Take the item from under the bench

passages.text:
<>
Canteen
\ <>ODYS: You are in the canteen. In the centre of the room there is a long table, and on the table there is a plastic plate with the remains of a meal. Near the edge of the table there is a small music player. Against the southern wall there is a row of machines: a meal dispenser, a tableware dispenser and a machine for returning used tableware. There is a coffee machine on a cart next to them. The only door leads north. <>ODYS: You are in the canteen. In the centre of the room there is a long table, and on the table there is a plastic plate with the remains of a meal. Near the edge of the table there is a small music player. Against the southern wall there is a row of machines: a meal dispenser, a tableware dispenser and a machine for returning used tableware. The only door leads north. <>ODYS: You are in the canteen. In the centre of the room there is a long table, and on the table there is a plastic plate with the remains of a meal, and a plastic cup. Near the edge of the table there is a small music player. Against the southern wall there is a row of machines: a meal dispenser, a tableware dispenser and a machine for returning used tableware. There is a coffee machine on a cart next to them. The only door leads north. <>ODYS: You are in the canteen. In the centre of the room there is a long table, and on the table there is a plastic plate with the remains of a meal, and a plastic cup. Examine the machines against the wall
What food is on that plate?

passages.name: wanttocheck
passages.text: ODYS: As you wish. <>\ [[Next|RoomD20]]

passages.name: angrycheck
passages.text: ODYS: I'm sorry, Sandra. I'm not trying to order you around. My only interest is your safety, which depends on how quickly you act. Forgive me if I was too blunt. If you wish to search these rooms, I won't stop you, but remember – your chances of being rescued grow smaller the more time you waste. <>\ [[Next|RoomD20]]

passages.name: RoomD25
passages.text:
<>
Robert Marsh's room
\ <>\ <> You enter the room and jump, startled by alarming sounds of explosions and torn metal. You realise the sounds are played in a loop. This must be some sort of recording. <>\ <>\ ODYS: You are in captain Robert Marsh's room. It's more spacious than the other crew rooms. There is a bed, a wardrobe and a small table here. In the southern end of the room there is a desk with several computer monitors on it. The screens flash, showing many warning messages. The only door is in the eastern wall of the room. [[Examine the wardrobe and the table|marshtable]] [[What makes these noises?|askrecording]] [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Robert Marsh's room
\ <>\ <> You enter the room and jump, startled by alarming sounds of explosions and torn metal. You realise the sounds are played in a loop. This must be some sort of recording. <>\ <>\ <>ODYS: You are in captain Robert Marsh's room. It's more spacious than the other crew rooms. There is a bed, a wardrobe and a small table here. In the southern end of the room there is a desk with several computer monitors on it. The screens flash, showing many warning messages. The only door is in the eastern wall of the room.<> <>[[Examine the wardrobe and the table|marshtable]] [[What makes these noises?|askrecording]] [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>\

links.text: Examine the wardrobe and the table

passages.name: openmarshroom
passages.text: ODYS: This door leads to the room of Robert Marsh, the station's commander. I'll open it for you. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomD25]] [[Back|RoomD20]]

passages.name: RoomD24
passages.text:
Sasha Zinov's room
\ <>ODYS: You are in Sasha Zinov's quarters. It is a very tidy, impersonal room. Other than the bed and the computer desk, there is a bookshelf here with thirty-two books on it. One more book lies open, cover up, on the neatly made bed. The door is in the southern wall of the room. [[Examine the bookshelf|sashasbooks]] [[What book is on the bed?|whatbook]] [[What about the computer?|asksashaspc]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>ODYS: You are in Sasha Zinov's quarters. It is a very tidy, impersonal room. Other than the bed and the computer desk, there is a bookshelf here with thirty-two books on it. One more book lies open, cover up, on the neatly made bed. The door is in the southern wall of the room. <>[[Examine the bookshelf|sashasbooks]] [[What book is on the bed?|whatbook]] [[What about the computer?|asksashaspc]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>ODYS: You managed to get into Sasha Zinov's room. Just like in his office, the camera in here is covered. It's located above the bed, in the north-western corner of the room. <>[[Uncover the camera|roomcamera]] [[Go through the southern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>

links.text: What book is on the bed?

passages.name: opensasharoom
passages.text: ODYS: This door leads to the room of Sasha Zinov, the IT specialist. The lock is coded; I can't open it. [[Did Sasha set this code when the Outworlders attacked, too?|asksashascode]] <> [[Use Sasha's keycard to unlock the door|unlocksasharoom]] <>\ <>\ [[Back|RoomD20]]

links.text: Did Sasha set this code when the Outworlders attacked, too?
Use Sasha's keycard to unlock the door

passages.name: asksashascode
passages.text: ODYS: No, he put this security measure here before. Zinov was distrustful by nature. [[Back|opensasharoom]]

passages.name: unlocksasharoom
passages.text: You put Sasha's keycard to the panel. The door opens. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomD24]] [[Back|RoomD20]]

passages.name: sashascard
passages.text: A keycard which belonged to Sasha Zinov. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: RoomD23
passages.text:
<>
Jim Mulligan's room
\ ODYS: You are in Jim Mulligan's room. There is a bed, a bookshelf and a computer desk here. A portable communication device is lying on the desk. The only door leads north. [[Examine the bookshelf|muligansbooks]] [[Examine the computer|mullpc]] [[Examine the comm device|mullcomm]] [[Go through the northern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Jim Mulligan's room
\ ODYS: You are in Jim Mulligan's room. There is a bed, a bookshelf and a computer desk here. A portable communication device is lying on the desk. The only door leads north. <>[[Examine the bookshelf|muligansbooks]] [[Examine the computer|mullpc]] [[Examine the comm device|mullcomm]] [[Go through the northern door|RoomD20]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>

passages.name: openmulliganroom
passages.text: ODYS: This door leads to the room of Jim Mulligan, chief technician. I'll open it for you. <>\ [[Go through the door|RoomD23]] [[Back|RoomD20]]

passages.name: muligansbooks
passages.text: ODYS: It's all technical literature. Paper, properly stored, is much more reliable than most computer systems, so regulations require that certain documents on the station are available in this form too. [[Back|RoomD23]]

passages.name: mullpc
passages.text: ODYS: The computer is switched off. [[Back|RoomD23]]

passages.name: mullcomm
passages.text: ODYS: The comm device is not working. It seems to be broken. Mulligan likely planned to repair it. [[Back|RoomD23]]

passages.name: marshtable
passages.text: ODYS: Only captain's personal things are here – mostly clothing. [[Back|RoomD25]]

passages.name: askrecording
passages.text: ODYS: One of the screens displays a looped camera recording of the Outworlders' bombardment hitting the station. The recording ends abruptly, as the camera was destroyed. [[What about the other screens? What do they show?|otherscreens]] [[What exactly does this recording show?|attackdescr]] [[Back|RoomD25]]

links.text: What about the other screens? What do they show?
What exactly does this recording show?

passages.name: otherscreens
passages.text: ODYS: Alarms and warning messages. Mostly about all sorts of damage to the station. Basically, it's a summary of the most important information sent to the command centre. Thanks to these monitors the captain always has his finger on the pulse. [[Back|askrecording]]

passages.name: attackdescr
passages.text: ODYS: Not much. Just a stretch of section II southern corridor. The loop ends with shots of the ceiling collapsing. The cannon fire is barely visible as blurry flashes. [[Back|askrecording]]

passages.name: roomcamera
passages.text: You stand on Sasha's bed. You reach up and find a camera with lens taped up. You peel off the tape. ODYS: Now I can describe the room to you. <>\ [[Next|RoomD24]]

passages.name: sashasbooks
passages.text: ODYS: It's mostly IT literature. There are also some novels mixed in. [[What kind of novels did Sasha read?|bookgenres]] [[Back|RoomD24]]

links.text: What kind of novels did Sasha read?

passages.name: whatbook
passages.text: ODYS: A large tome – it's Joyce's "Ulysses". SANDRA: Never heard about it. What's the story? ODYS: I'm sorry, this information is not recorded in my database. You'll have to check it yourself sometime. SANDRA: Maybe I'll read it when I get my sight back. [[Back|RoomD24]]

passages.name: asksashaspc
passages.text: ODYS: It's switched off. [[Back|RoomD24]]

passages.name: bookgenres
passages.text: ODYS: Judging by the books on the shelf, he enjoyed thrillers and spy novels. [[Back|RoomD24]]

passages.name: traineq
passages.text: ODYS: The equipment shows no signs of intensive use. [[Back|RoomD21]]

passages.name: takebackpack
passages.text: You bend down and touch the object. You pick it up and turn in your hands. It's a textile backpack. There's some clothing inside. <>SANDRA: The backpack may prove useful, less so these sweaty rags.<> <>You put the clothes on the bench and take the backpack.<> <>Item received: Backpack<> <>\ <>[[Back|RoomD21]]<>

passages.name: take cup
passages.text: Item received: Plastic cup <><>\ [[Back|RoomD22]]

passages.name: checkdispensers
passages.text: <>SANDRA: The coffee machine is back in its place. <>SANDRA: The coffee machine is back in its place, but it's of no use to me here. If I send it to the northern lock, I might be able to thaw the ice with boiling water. <>SANDRA: There should be a coffee machine here, too, but Doctor Romani has taken it to her lab. She was the only person on the station who drank more coffee than me. <>SANDRA: That's weird – you didn't mention the coffee machine. It should be here. ODYS: I don't see it anywhere in the room. By the way, it's interesting you realised it's missing. SANDRA: Nothing special about that. Coffee is the only thing that gets me going in the morning. Only Doctor Romani drank more coffee than me. Listen, Odys – can you check the camera in the lab? ODYS: On it... yes, I see the coffee machine there – I assume that's what you were interested in. SANDRA: Yes. I have to get to the laboratory. ODYS: The door is locked, but you can get in from the central intersection, through the ventilation duct. <>\ <>ODYS: There's a food dispenser, a tableware dispenser and a machine for returning used tableware here. <>\ [[Examine the food dispenser|foodmachine]] [[Examine the tableware dispenser|platesmachine]] [[Examine the machine for returning used tableware|dirtymachine]] [[Back|RoomD22]]

links.text: Examine the machine for returning used tableware

passages.name: foodmachine
passages.text: Whichever buttons you press, nothing happens. ODYS: This machine is not working – it must be out of order. [[Back|checkdispensers]]

passages.name: platesmachine
passages.text: <>ODYS: There are alarm lights flashing on the dispenser – it needs repairs. [[Back|checkdispensers]] <>ODYS: There are alarm lights flashing on the dispenser – it needs repairs. There is a teaspoon on the dispenser tray. [[Pick up the teaspoon|takespoon]] [[Back|checkdispensers]] <>\

passages.name: dirtymachine
passages.text: ODYS: This machine seems to be disconnected from the mains. [[Back|checkdispensers]]

passages.name: takespoon
passages.text: Item received: Teaspoon <>\ [[Back|checkdispensers]]

passages.name: spoon
passages.text: A metal teaspoon. [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: whatfood
passages.text: ODYS: Some mashed potatoes and a sausage. [[Back|RoomD22]]

passages.name: checkmusic
passages.text: <>The music player is on. [[Turn off the player|musicoff]] [[Back|RoomD22]] <>The music player is off. [[Turn on the player|musicon]] [[Back|RoomD22]] <>

passages.name: musicoff
passages.text: You turn off the player. The music stops. You hear a scratching noise – the little robot runs to its hiding place. <>\ [[Back|checkmusic]]

passages.name: musicon
passages.text: You turn on the device. It starts playing an energetic tune. Suddenly you hear a quiet, metallic scratching. Something moves closer to the music player. <>\ <> SANDRA: Must be that funny little guy again. Hello there. [[Back|checkmusic]] <> ODYS: That's astounding – you managed to lure a tiny service robot from its hideout behind the dispensers. It seems to be drawn by the music – what a curious programming oddity. Oh – it's carrying something on its back. A cookie, if I'm not mistaken. [[Take the cookie|takecookie2]] [[Eat the cookie|eatcookie2]] [[Back|checkmusic]] <>

passages.name: takecookie2
passages.text: You bend down and take the foil-wrapped cookie from the robot's manipulator. The little robot takes no notice – he continues jumping to the rhythm. Item received: Cookie <><>\ [[Back|checkmusic]]

passages.name: eatcookie2
passages.text: SANDRA: It's foil-wrapped, so I guess it's safe... You open the package and eat the cookie. SANDRA: Chocolate – my favourite. <><>\ [[Back|checkmusic]]

passages.name: cookie2
passages.text: A cookie you took from the little dancing robot. [[Eat the cookie|itemeatcookie2]] [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: itemeatcookie2
passages.text: SANDRA: It's foil-wrapped, so I guess it's safe... You open the package and eat the cookie. SANDRA: Chocolate – my favourite. <><>\ <><>\ <>\ <>\ [[Back|Items]]

passages.name: dancingrobot
passages.text: The little robot is jiggling to the music.<><> It's holding a cookie in its manipulator.<> ODYS: I'm afraid its software needs patching. <>\ <> [[Take the cookie|takecookie22]] [[Eat the cookie|eatcookie22]] <>\ [[Back|RoomD22]]

passages.name: takecookie22
passages.text: You bend down and take the foil-wrapped cookie from the robot's manipulator. The little robot takes no notice – he continues jumping to the rhythm. Item received: Cookie <><>\ [[Back|RoomD22]]

passages.name: eatcookie22
passages.text: SANDRA: It's foil-wrapped, so I guess it's safe... You open the package and eat the cookie. SANDRA: Chocolate – my favourite. <><>\ [[Back|RoomD22]]

passages.name: frozendoor
passages.text: It's icy cold near this door. ODYS: The door is completely iced over. You'd need more than a coffee machine to melt the ice. But it wouldn't be a good idea, anyway. There are leaking refrigerant tanks behind the door. [[Back|RoomD15]]

passages.name: RoomD16
passages.text:
<>
Section II northern corridor, northern part
\ ODYS: You are in the northern corridor of section II. The corridor goes south. To the north there is the lift to section I. Near the lift door a broken robot is lying on the floor. There is a door in the western wall of the corridor. In the ceiling there is a hatch. [[Examine the robot|checkbadrobot]] <> [[Take lift to section I|RoomF1]] <> [[Take lift to section I|IntropartF]] <> [[Take lift to section I|brokenlift]] <> [[Take lift to section I|nocode]] <>\ <> [[Install the fuse in the lift control box|mountfused1]] <> [[Install the fuse in the lift control box|mountfused2]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Go through the western door|RoomD17]] <> [[Go through the western door|findblood]] <> [[Go through the western door|officeclosed]] <>\ [[Examine the hatch|hatchD16]] [[Go south|RoomD15]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>
Section II northern corridor, northern part
\ ODYS: You are in the northern corridor of section II. The corridor goes south. To the north there is the lift to section I. Near the lift door a broken robot is lying on the floor. There is a door in the western wall of the corridor. In the ceiling there is a hatch. <>[[Examine the robot|checkbadrobot]] <> [[Take lift to section I|RoomF1]] <> [[Take lift to section I|IntropartF]] <> [[Take lift to section I|brokenlift]] <> [[Take lift to section I|nocode]] <>\ <> [[Install the fuse in the lift control box|mountfused1]] <> [[Install the fuse in the lift control box|mountfused2]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Go through the western door|RoomD17]] <> [[Go through the western door|findblood]] <> [[Go through the western door|officeclosed]] <>\ [[Examine the hatch|hatchD16]] [[Go south|RoomD15]] [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><><> <>\ <>\

links.text: Install the fuse in the lift control box
Install the fuse in the lift control box

passages.name: checkbadrobot
passages.text: You hear the robot move as you come closer. ODYS: It's an all-purpose humanoid robot used for heavy work. It's lying on the floor. Its legs were damaged with a series of handgun shots. [[Shots? If the aliens have never boarded the station, who shot it?|whoshot]] [[Can this robot be repaired?|fixbadrobot?]] [[Back|RoomD16]]

links.text: Shots? If the aliens have never boarded the station, who shot it?

passages.name: whoshot
passages.text: ODYS: Sasha Zinov, according to the camera feed. He was running to his office in panic. He had a gun with him, property of captain Marsh. He was terrified; when he saw the silhouette of the robot, he took it for an Outworlder and fired several shots. [[Back|checkbadrobot]]

passages.name: fixbadrobot?
passages.text: ODYS: It's certainly possible, but it would require a lot of time, plus appropriate spare parts and tools. And skills, of course. [[Back|checkbadrobot]]

passages.name: IntropartF
passages.text: <>\ You go up in the lift. <>ODYS: I have bad news. An Outworlders' ship has just docked to the section I module. Several aliens have boarded the station. But, please, do not panic. I have a plan. I've already started carrying it out.<> <>[[I should hide myself.|shouldhide]]<> <>[[You told me I can defend myself against them.|candefend]]<> <>[[What plan?|theplan]]<>

links.text: You told me I can defend myself against them.

passages.name: brokenlift
passages.text: <>ODYS: You can't call the lift until you've replaced the fuses. [[Back|RoomD16]] <>You press the button, but the lift doesn't come. ODYS: That's very unfortunate – it seems that the fuses are burnt out. But I know where to find replacements. Go to the eastern wing of the section and remove fuses from the control box of the lift that goes down to the tunnels. <>\ [[Back|RoomD16]] <>

passages.name: nocode
passages.text: ODYS: It's no use going to the command centre without the emergency code. First you have to go to Sasha's office. That's the room west from here. [[Back|RoomD16]]

passages.name: mountfused1
passages.text: <>You open the box and install the first fuse. Item lost: Fuse <><><>\ [[Back|RoomD16]] <>You open the box and install the second fuse. ODYS: All right – the lift is working now. Item lost: Fuse <><><><>\ [[Back|RoomD16]] <>\ <>\

passages.name: mountfused2
passages.text: <>You open the box and install the first fuse. Item lost: Fuse <><><>\ [[Back|RoomD16]] <>You open the box and install the second fuse. ODYS: All right – the lift is working now. Item lost: Fuse <><><><>\ [[Back|RoomD16]] <>\ <>\

passages.name: RoomD17
passages.text:
Sasha Zinov's office
\ <>ODYS: You are in Sasha Zinov's office. In the centre of the room there is a large desk with an array of computer monitors. Many small items are scattered across the desk. Next to the desk, by a chair, Sasha's body is lying on the floor. Against the eastern wall of the room there is a sideboard with one large drawer. The only door in the room leads east. [[Examine the body on the floor|sashasbody]] [[Examine the desk|pcdesk]] <> [[Plug the dongle into the computer|dongletopc]] <>\ <>\ [[Examine the sideboard|checksideboard]] <> [[Go through the eastern door|RoomD16]] <> [[Go through the eastern door|congratsd17]] <> [[Go through the eastern door|dontleaved17]] <>\ [[Open inventory|Items]] <><><> <>ODYS: You need to hurry and uncover that camera. [[Go left from the door|goleft]] <>\ <> [[Go straight from the door|gostraight]] <>\ <>\ <> [[Go right from the door|goright]] <>\ [[Why did Sasha cover up the camera?|whycameraoff]] <>As you enter Sasha's office you hear a three-note signal coming from the corridor. You recognise it – it announces a spaceship approaching the station. <>SANDRA: What's going on?<> <>ODYS: Bad news, Sandra. An Outworlders' ship is nearing the station. I don't know why they returned, but it's very unlikely they have peaceful intentions.<> <>SANDRA: What can we do? They're going to kill me!<> <>ODYS: All is not lost yet. They are far away – our systems have detected their ship, as it doesn't have cloaking activated. It may be a different vessel. If they bombard the station, you'll have little chance of survival, but I suspect the purpose of their visit is different now. They may be scavengers who learned about us from the first ship's crew.<> <>SANDRA: They want to plunder the station?<> <>ODYS: Probably. Many valuable items and materials can be found here. Let's hope you'll be able to avoid – or eliminate – the aliens if they board the station. I'll be constantly analysing the situation and informing you about the best course of action. However, our main priority remains the same – you need to get that code from Sasha's computer. Forget about the Outworlders for now.<> <>SANDRA: Where is that code?<> <>ODYS: The camera in this room shows only black image. Zinov has covered it up with something. You have to uncover the camera, so that I can guide you. The camera is installed under the ceiling, to the left from the door.<> <> <>[[Go left from the door|goleft]]<> <>\ <> <>[[Go straight from the door|gostraight]]<> <>\ <>\ <> <>[[Go right from the door|goright]]<> <> <>[[Why did Sasha cover up the camera?|whycameraoff]]<> <>

links.text: Examine the body on the floor
Plug the dongle into the computer
Why did Sasha cover up the camera?

passages.name: findblood
